artefacts.name: Chaos - Iron husk
artefacts.description: The model’s Resilience is set to 6.

artefacts.name: Chaos - Kaleidoscopic Flesh
artefacts.description: The model gains Hard Target (1)

artefacts.name: Chaos (Guiding) - Kaleidoscopic Flesh
artefacts.description: Dominant. The model and each R&F model in its unit gains Hard Target (1)

artefacts.name: Chaos - Mark of the Eternal Champion
artefacts.description: If the bearer is not a Wizard, it becomes a Wizard Apprentice that does not select spells as normal but always knows Spear of Infinity (Hereditary Spell). If the bearer is already a Wizard, it knows Spear of Infinity in addition to its other spells and cannot select it during Spell Selection.

artefacts.name: Chaos - Mirrored Scales
artefacts.description: Each Close Combat Attack allocated towards the bearer that rolls a natural ‘1’ on its to-hit roll hits the attacking model’s Health Pool instead.

artefacts.name: Chaos (Guiding) - Mirrored Scales
artefacts.description: Dominantt. Each Close Combat Attack allocated towards the bearer and R&F models in its unit that rolls a natural ‘1’ on its to-hit roll hits the attacking model’s Health Pool instead.

artefacts.name: Chaos - Withering Vapour
artefacts.description: The bearer gains a Breath Attack (Str 3, AP 2)

artefacts.name: Chaos - Hammer Hand
artefacts.description: The model gains +1 Attack Value.

artefacts.name: Chaos - Sorcerous Antennae
artefacts.description: At the start of Siphon the Veil in each of your Magic Phases, choose a single model part in each unit with one or more instances of this Manifestation. The chosen model part gains Channel (1) until the end of the Magic Phase.

artefacts.name: Chaos - Cloven Hooves
artefacts.description: The model gains Impact Hits (D3). These Impact Hits are resolved with Strength 5 and Armour Penetration 2.

artefacts.name: Chaos - Brimstone Secretions
artefacts.description: Attacks made against the model no longer are Divine Attacks (if they were).

artefacts.name: Chaos (Guilding) - Brimstone Secretions
artefacts.description: Dominant. Attacks made against the model and against R&F models in its unit no longer are Divine Attacks (if they were).

artefacts.name: Chaos - Centipede Legs
artefacts.description: The model gains +1″ Advance Rate.

artefacts.name: Chaos (Guilding)- Centipede Legs
artefacts.description: Dominant. The model and each R&F model in its unit gains +1″ Advance Rate.

artefacts.name: Chaos - Charged Tendrils
artefacts.description: At the end of Siphon the Veil, each unit with one or more instances of this Manifestation allows the owner to store one additional Veil Token, up to a maximum of 6.

artefacts.name: Chaos - Chitinous Scales
artefacts.description: The model gains +2 Armour, to a maximum of 3.

artefacts.name: Chaos - Dark Hide
artefacts.description: The model gains Scout with the following exception: it must be deployed fully inside the owner’s Deployment Zone, and the owner must have deployed at least one unit normally.

artefacts.name: Chaos - Living Shield
artefacts.description: The model gains Parry.

artefacts.name: Chaos (Guilding) - Living Shield
artefacts.description: The model and each R&F model in its unit gains Parry.

artefacts.name: Chaos - Unnatural Roots
artefacts.description: A side with one or more units with one or more instances of Unnatural Roots Engaged in Combat at the end of the Round of Combat adds +1 to its Combat Score

artefacts.name: Chaos - Third Eye
artefacts.description: At the beginning of each friendly Charge Phase, draw the Flux Card for that Player Turn instead of step 2 of the Magic Phase Sequence.

artefacts.name: Chaos - Dextrous Tentacles
artefacts.description: The model gains +1 Agility.

artefacts.name: Chaos (Guilding) - Dextrous Tentacles
artefacts.description: Dominant. The model and each R&F model in its unit gains +1 Agility.

artefacts.name: Envy - Greenfire Eyes
artefacts.description: One use only. Must be activated when the model’s unit fails its first Charge Range roll. The unit must reroll the Charge Range roll.

artefacts.name: Envy - Piercing Spike
artefacts.description: Close Combat Attacks against enemy models with an Armour value of 3 or higher made by the model gain +1 Strength and +1 Armour Penetration.

artefacts.name: Envy (Guilding) - Piercing Spike
artefacts.description: Dominant. Close Combat Attacks against enemy models with an Armour value of 3 or higher made by the model and each R&F model in its unit gain +1 Strength and +1 Armour Penetration.

artefacts.name: Envy - Venom Sacs
artefacts.description: The model gains Poison Attacks. If the model’s Close Combat Attacks or those of R&F models in its unit already were Poison Attacks from another source than this Manifestation, the attack will automatically wound on successful to-hit rolls of 5+, instead of 6+.

artefacts.name: Envy (Guilding) - Venom Sacs
artefacts.description: Dominant. The model and each R&F model in its unit gains Poison Attacks. If the model’s Close Combat Attacks or those of R&F models in its unit already were Poison Attacks from another source than this Manifestation, the attack will automatically wound on successful to-hit rolls of 5+, instead of 6+.

artefacts.name: Gluttony - Broodmother
artefacts.description: Dominant. At the end of each Round of Combat during which the model’s unit was Engaged in Combat, and during which the model caused at least three Health Point losses with Close Combat Attacks, the unit Raises D3 Health Points.

artefacts.name: Gluttony (Guilding) - Broodmother
artefacts.description: Dominant. At the end of each Round of Combat during which the model’s unit was Engaged in Combat, and during which the model and R&F models in the bearer’s unit caused at least three Health Point losses with Close Combat Attacks, the unit Raises D3 Health Points.

artefacts.name: Gluttony - Digestive Vomit
artefacts.description: One use only. Must be activated the first time the bearer’s unit performs a Post-Combat Pivot or a PostCombat Reform. The model gains +1 Strength and +1 Armour Penetration until the end of the game.

artefacts.name: Gluttony (Guilding) - Digestive Vomit
artefacts.description: Dominant. One use only. Must be activated the first time the bearer’s unit performs a Post-Combat Pivot or a PostCombat Reform. The model and each R&F model in its unit gains +1 Strength and +1 Armour Penetration until the end of the game.

artefacts.name: Gluttony - Unhinging Jaw
artefacts.description: The model must reroll failed to-wound rolls from Close Combat Attacks against Large or Gigantic models.

artefacts.name: Gluttony (Guilding) - Unhinging Jaw
artefacts.description: Dominant. The model and each R&F model in its unit must reroll failed to-wound rolls from Close Combat Attacks against Large or Gigantic models.

artefacts.name: Greed - Grasping Proboscis
artefacts.description: At the end of each Round of Combat during which the model’s unit was Engaged in Combat, and the model caused at least three Health Point losses by Close Combat Attacks, you gain D3 Veil Token to your Veil Token pool.

artefacts.name: Greed (Guilding) - Grasping Proboscis
artefacts.description: Dominant. At the end of each Round of Combat during which the model’s unit was Engaged in Combat, and the model and R&F model in the bearer’s unit caused at least three Health Point losses by Close Combat Attacks, you gain D3 Veil Token to your Veil Token pool.

artefacts.name: Greed - Smothering Coils
artefacts.description: The model gains +1 to-wound with Close Combat Attacks against models with Scoring.

artefacts.name: Greed (Guilding) - Smothering Coils
artefacts.description: Dominant. The model and each R&F model in its unit gains +1 to-wound with Close Combat Attacks against models with Scoring.

artefacts.name: Greed - Divining Snout
artefacts.description: When Charging a unit that contains more than one Special Item, the model must reroll failed Charge Range rolls when rolling for Charge Range and gains +2″ Advance Rate for the Charge Range roll. The effects only apply if all models in the unit are affected by Divining Snout.

artefacts.name: Greed - Divining Snout
artefacts.description: Dominant. When Charging a unit that contains more than one Special Item, the model and each R&F model in its unit must reroll failed Charge Range rolls when rolling for Charge Range and gains +2″ Advance Rate for the Charge Range roll. The effects only apply if all models in the unit are affected by Divining Snout.

artefacts.name: Lust - Mesmerising Plumage
artefacts.description: Dominant. Enemy units in base contact with one or more models with this Manifestation suffer −1 Offensive Skill and −1 Defensive Skill.

artefacts.name: Lust - Roaming Hands
artefacts.description: When the unit is Engaged with an enemy unit’s Flank or Rear Facing, the model gains +1 Strength and +1 Armour Penetration.

artefacts.name: Lust (Guilding) - Roaming Hands
artefacts.description: Dominant. When the unit is Engaged with an enemy unit’s Flank or Rear Facing, the model and each R&F model in its unit gains +1 Strength and +1 Armour Penetration.

artefacts.name: Lust - Hot Blood
artefacts.description: The model gains Devastating Charge (+2 Agi).

artefacts.name: Lust (Guilding) - Hot Blood
artefacts.description: Dominant. The model and each R&F model in its unit gains Devastating Charge (+2 Agi).

artefacts.name: Pride - Stiff Upper Lip
artefacts.description: Discipline Tests taken by units with at least one model with this Manifestation are subject to Minimised Roll.

artefacts.name: Pride - Bronze Backbone
artefacts.description: The model gains Hatred.

artefacts.name: Pride (Guildding) - Bronze Backbone
artefacts.description: Dominant. The model and each R&F model in its unit gains Hatred.

artefacts.name: Pride - Horns of Hubris
artefacts.description: The model gains Vanguard (6″).

artefacts.name: Pride (Guilding) - Horns of Hubris
artefacts.description: Dominant. The model and each R&F model in its unit gains Vanguard (6″).

artefacts.name: Sloth - Chilling Yawn
artefacts.description: Dominant. Enemy units in base contact with one or more models with this Manifestation suffer −2 Agility.

artefacts.name: Sloth - Aura of Despair
artefacts.description: Dominant. Enemy units suffer −2 Advance Rate to a minimum of 1 when rolling for Charge Range against units with at least one model with this Manifestation.

artefacts.name: Sloth - Segmented Shell
artefacts.description: When the model suffers a wound from an attack with Multiple Wounds, the number of wounds that it is multiplied into (due to Multiple Wounds) is reduced by 1, to a minimum of 1.

artefacts.name: Sloth (Guildding) - Segmented Shell
artefacts.description: Dominant. When the model or a R&F model in its unit suffers a wound from an attack with Multiple Wounds, the number of wounds that it is multiplied into (due to Multiple Wounds) is reduced by 1, to a minimum of 1.

artefacts.name: Wrath - Whipcrack Tail
artefacts.description: The model gains Lightning Reflexes.

artefacts.name: Wrath (Guilding) - Whipcrack Tail
artefacts.description: Dominant. The model and each R&F model in its unit gains Lightning Reflexes.

artefacts.name: Wrath - Red Haze
artefacts.description: The model’s Close Combat Attacks gain +1 Strength and +1 Armour Penetration, but each of its Close Combat Attacks with a natural to-hit roll of ‘1’ is distributed onto the bearer’s unit.

artefacts.name: Wrath (Guiilding) - Red Haze
artefacts.description: Dominant. The model’s Close Combat Attacks and those of R&F models in its unit gain +1 Strength and +1 Armour Penetration, but each of its Close Combat Attacks with a natural to-hit roll of ‘1’ is distributed onto the bearer’s unit.

artefacts.name: Wrath - Incendiary Ichor
artefacts.description: The model gains Aegis (2+, against Flaming Attacks). All Melee Attacks (including Special Attacks) and Shooting Attacks made by the model with Incendiary Ichor become Flaming Attacks. The bearer automatically fails all Fortitude Saves.

artefacts.name: Wrath (Guilding) - Incendiary Ichor
artefacts.description: Dominant. The model and each R&F model in its unit gains Aegis (2+, against Flaming Attacks). All Melee Attacks (including Special Attacks) and Shooting Attacks made by the model with Incendiary Ichor and each R&F model in its unit become Flaming Attacks. The bearer and each R&F model in its unit automatically fails all Fortitude Saves.

specialrules.specialrule: Wizard Apprentice  (Spear of Infinity, Hand of Heaven)
